```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(DT)
```

Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
# Controls
selectInput(
inputId = "method",
label   = "Preprocessing method",
choices = c("Raw" = "raw",
"RF (3DMASC)" = "rf",
"XGBoost" = "xgb"),
selected = "xgb"
)

radioButtons(
inputId = "layer",
label   = "Layer to display",
choices = c("DTM" = "dtm",
"CHM" = "chm",
"Visibility (central structure)" = "vis"),
selected = "chm"
)

# Metrics
metrics <- tibble::tribble(
~Method,          ~Class,        ~Precision, ~Recall, ~F1,
"RF",             "Vegetation",  0.68,       0.79,    0.73,
"RF",             "Other",       0.70,       0.57,    0.63,
"XGB (random)",   "Vegetation",  0.9892,     0.9955,  0.9924,
"XGB (random)",   "Other",       0.9513,     0.8904,  0.9198,
"XGB (tile)",     "Vegetation",  0.9891,     0.9957,  0.9924,
"XGB (tile)",     "Other",       0.9531,     0.8896,  0.9203
)

DT::renderDataTable({
DT::datatable(
metrics,
options = list(dom = 't', pageLength = 10),
rownames = FALSE
)
})
